configJson.crafty_logs_delete_after_days: How long Crafty should hold onto app logs (days)
configJson.delete_default_json: Delete default JSON file on startup
configJson.dir_size_poll_freq_minutes: How often Crafty should poll your server directories for their sizes (minutes)
configJson.enable_user_self_delete: Allow users to delete their own account
configJson.history_max_age: How long Crafty should hold onto your server statistics (days)
configJson.keywords: Keywords Crafty should highlight in your server terminals
configJson.language: Global system language. (For public pages and translation fallback)
configJson.max_audit_entries: Maximum number of entries allowed in Crafty's activity log
configJson.max_log_lines: Maximum number of log lines per file
configJson.max_login_attempts: Maximum number of times a remote IP can fail login before we time it out
configJson.stats_update_frequency_seconds: How often we should poll your server for stats (seconds)
configJson.virtual_terminal_lines: How many lines we should allow in your server terminal buffer

error.bigBucket1: Big Bucket Health Check Failed. Please check
error.contact: Contact Crafty Control Support via Discord
error.duplicateId: Request tokens must only specify session_id or token_id, not both.
error.embarassing: Oh my, well, this is embarrassing.
error.fileError: File type must be an image.
error.installerJava: Failed to install {} : Forge Server Installs require Java. We have detected that Java is not installed. Please install Java, then install the server.
error.internet: We have detected the machine running Crafty has no connection to the internet. Client connections to the server may be limited.
error.migration: Crafty's main server storage is being migrated to a new location. All server starts have been suspended during this time. Please wait while we finish this migration
error.no-file: We can't seem to locate the requested file. Double-check the path. Does Crafty have proper permissions?
error.noInternet: Crafty is having trouble accessing the internet. Server Creation has been disabled. Please check your internet connection and refresh this page.
error.noJava: Server {} failed to start with error: We have detected Java is not installed. Please install Java, then start the server.
error.not-downloaded: We can't seem to find your executable file. Has it finished downloading? Are the permissions set to executable?
error.portReminder: We have detected this is the first time {} has been run. Make sure to forward port {} through your router/firewall to make this remotely accessible from the internet.
error.selfHost: If you are self-hosting this repo please check your address or consult our troubleshooting guide.
error.start-error: Server {} failed to start with error code: {}
error.superError: You must be a super user to complete this action.

login.accountDisabled: Your user account has been administratively disabled. Please contact your system administrator for more details.
login.burnedBackupCode: You have burned one of your backup codes. Please reroll your backup codes to avoid being locked out
login.defaultPath: The password you entered is the default credential path, not the password. Please find the default password in that location.

notify.backup_desc: We detected the backup migration may have partially or fully failed. Please confirm your backup records on the backups tab.
notify.finishedPreparing: We've finished preparing your support logs. Please click download to download
notify.preparingLogs: Please wait while we prepare your logs... We`ll send a notification when they`re ready. This may take a while for large deployments.
notify.schedule_desc: We detected some or all of your scheduled tasks were not successfully transferred during the upgrade. Please confirm your schedules in the schedules tab.

offline.pleaseConnect: Please connect to the internet to use Crafty.

otp.backupCodesMax: A maximum of 6 back codes has already been reached.
otp.backupOtp: An MFA method is required to request backup codes
otp.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MFA method?
otp.mfaWarn: You must have MFA enabled to interact with this system. Please create an MFA key. If you are seeing this message and have already created a key, please log out, then log back in with MFA.
otp.name: Name
otp.newName: Enter a friendly name for this MFA method
otp.otpReq: MFA is required for this user. You cannot remove your only MFA method.
otp.saveWarn: Make sure to save these backup codes or you could lose access
otp.verify: Failed to verify MFA. Incorrect code entered.

panelConfig.globalExplain: Where Crafty stores all your server files. (We will append the path with /servers/[uuid of server])
panelConfig.superConfirm: Proceed only if you want this user to have access to EVERYTHING (all user accounts, servers, panel settings, etc.). They can even revoke your superuser rights.
panelConfig.title: Crafty Configuration

rolesConfig.configDesc: Here is where you can change the configuration of your role
rolesConfig.doesNotExist: You cannot delete something that does not exist yet
rolesConfig.permsServer: Permissions this role has for these specified servers
rolesConfig.requireMFA: Require role users to enable MFA (Multi-Factor Authentication)
rolesConfig.roleDesc: What would you like to call this role?
rolesConfig.selectManager: Select a manager for this Role
rolesConfig.serversDesc: servers this role is allowed to access

serverBackups.backupTask: A backup task has been started.
serverBackups.confirmDelete: Do you want to delete this backup? This cannot be undone.
serverBackups.defaultExplain: The backup that Crafty will use before updates. This cannot be changed or deleted.
serverBackups.excludedChoose: Choose the paths you wish to exclude from your backups
serverBackups.inplace: Restore backup files in place - files that are not in the backup zip will remain in the server directory
serverBackups.maxBackupsDesc: Crafty will not store more than N backups, deleting the oldest (enter 0 to keep all)
serverBackups.name: Name
serverBackups.no-backup: No Backups. To make a new backup configuration please press. New Backup
serverBackups.radioRequired: You must choose an option to restore your backup
serverBackups.replace: Restore backup files and reset the server directory to be in the exact structure of the backup
serverBackups.restoring: Restoring Backup. This may take a while. Please be patient.
serverBackups.snapshotDisclaimer: Snapshot backups are currently in beta. Snapshot backups should only store one copy of a file and use much less disk space. Backup and restore do work well in testing but you may encounter unforeseen issues. You should not solely rely on this backup style for any mission critical backups. Please report any issues you encounter.
serverBackups.shutdown: Shutdown server for duration of backup
serverBackups.storageLocationDesc: Where do you want to store backups?

serverConfig.bePatientDelete: Please be patient while we remove your server from the Crafty panel. This screen will close in a few moments.
serverConfig.bePatientDeleteFiles: Please be patient while we remove your server from the Crafty panel and delete all files. This screen will close in a few moments.
serverConfig.bePatientUpdate:
Please be patient while we update the server. Download times can vary depending upon your internet speeds.
This screen will refresh in a moment
serverConfig.countPlayers: Include server in total player count
serverConfig.crashTimeDesc: How long should we wait before we consider your server as crashed?
serverConfig.deleteFilesQuestionMessage:
Would you like Crafty to delete all server files from the host machine?

This includes server backups.
serverConfig.deleteServerQuestionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this server? After this there is no going back...
serverConfig.ignoredExitsExplain: Exit codes Crafty's Crash detection should ignore as a normal 'stop' (separated by commas)
serverConfig.javaVersionDesc: If you're going to override Java, make sure your current Java path in 'execution command' is wrapped in quotes (default 'java' variable excluded)
serverConfig.removeOldLogsAfterDesc: How many days should we keep log files for? (0 is off)
serverConfig.serverExecutionCommandDesc: What will be launched in a hidden terminal
serverConfig.serverIPDesc: IP Crafty should connect to for stats (Try a real IP instead of 127.0.0.1 if you have issues)
serverConfig.serverNameDesc: What you wish to call this server
serverConfig.serverPortDesc: Port Crafty should connect to for stats
serverConfig.serverStopCommandDesc: Command to send the program to stop it
serverConfig.statsHint1: The port your server is running on should go here. This is just how Crafty opens a connection to your server for stats.
serverConfig.statsHint2: This does not change the port of your server. You must still change the port in your server config file.
serverConfig.stopBeforeDeleting: Please stop the server before deleting it
serverConfig.timeoutExplain1: How long Crafty will wait for your server to shutdown after executing the
serverConfig.timeoutExplain2: command before it forces the process down.

serverConfigHelp.desc: Here is where you can change the configuration of your server
perms: It is recommended to NOT change the paths of a server managed by Crafty.
Changing paths CAN break things, especially on Linux type operating systems where file permissions are more locked down.
If you feel you have to change where a server is located you may do so as long as you give the "crafty" user permission to read / write to the server path.
On Linux, this is best done by executing the following:
serverConfigHelp.title: Server Config Area

serverFiles.clickUpload: Click here to select your files

serverScheduleConfig.time-explain: What time do you want your schedule to execute?

validators.2FAerror: Multi-Factor code must be 6 digits (i.e. 000000) or a backup code of 16 characters separated every 4 by - (i.e. ABCD-EFGH-IJKL-MNOP)
validators.additionalProperties: Additional Properties are not allowed to be passed
validators.backupName: Backup name must be a string and a minimum length of 3.
validators.filesPageLen: length must be greater than 1 for property
validators.insufficientPerms: Permission Error: Missing permissions for this resource
validators.mfaName: Input must be of type string and a minimum of 3 characters for property
validators.passProp: Password must be a string with a min length of 8 characters.
validators.roleManager: Role manager must be of type integer (manager ID) or None
validators.roleName: Role name must be a string that is greater than 1 character. It must not include any of the following symbols: [ ] ,
validators.roleServerId: Server ID property must be a string with a minimum length of 1
validators.roleServerPerms: Server permissions must be an 8-bit string
validators.serverCreateName: Server name must be a string with a minimum length of 2 and must not include: \ / or #
validators.serverExeCommand: Server execution command must be a string with a minimum length of 1.
validators.serverLogPath: Server log path must be a string with a minimum length of 1
validators.taskIntervalType: Task Interval Type must be one of the following:
validators.typeBool: must be true or false (type boolean)
validators.typeIntMinVal0: must be an integer with a minimum value of 0.
validators.userName: must be of type string, all LOWERCASE, a minimum of 4 characters and a max of 20 characters
